>Scans from Yamakawa Hiroshi's book "Kyoto Shugoshoku Shimatsu"
>https://mywebspace.wisc.edu/tnamwong/web/YH.zip
>nice pic of a wakizashi, most pics are calligraphy

yh1-- Emperor Koumei's handwriting, conferring third court rank on 
Matsudaira Katamori.
yh2-- wakizashi
yh3-- Various Kyoto-related papers from Genji 1, 7th month (circa Ikedaya 
Incident time). Picture of Matsudaira Katamori taken on Bunkyu 3 (1863), 8th 
month, 5th day-- right around the time he got the orders to go to Kyoto.
yh4-- Not sure-- a written memorial, perhaps? Far right, lower right hand 
corner, says "Minamoto Katamori" (keep in mind the Tokugawa/Matsudaira 
claimed Minamoto descent), and the far lower left-hand corner has Yamakawa's 
name.

--M.
